title: GLAM-Workbench/trove-random
description:
Current version: v1.0.0

Jupyter notebooks to work with data from Trove’s music and sound zone.

See the Trove music and sound section of the GLAM Workbench for more details.

Notebook topics

  • Harvest ABC Radio National records from Trove – harvests, cleans, and saves all the available Radio National data from Trove.

  • Exploring ABC Radio National metadata – shows a few ways you can start to explore the ABC Radio National metadata.

Cite as

See the GLAM Workbench or Zenodo for up-to-date citation details.

This repository is part of the GLAM Workbench.
